descriptionHtml:
Name: Keening Texture by BeyondTom
Version: 1.0
Date: 06/08/2012
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): BeyondTom

Description
===========
Improved texture for Keening.

Details
=======
The texture for Keening didn't look as nice as it could have to I made a few changes.
(File was a request)

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)SkyrimData

Uninstall
=========
Simply remove the following files:
Datatexturesweaponskeeningkeening.dds
Datatexturesweaponskeeningkeening_m.dds (if you have the shine version)
Datatexturesweaponskeeningkeening_n.dds

Incompatibility
===============
There should be no incompatibility with other mods.

History
=======
1.0, 06/08/2012 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
Feel free to send me a message through the forums.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for such a great site
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator.

Tools Used
==========
GIMP - http://www.gimp.org/
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
7-Zip - http://www.7-zip.org/

Licensing/Legal
===============
I must be notified before you use these textures.
author: BeyondTom
